author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Hilton London Bankside - now open
text:
Hilton London Bankside - now open Hilton London Bankside - now open Details Category: Hotel   16:10 Hilton London Bankside has announced that it is now officially open. With its fantastic location on Suffolk Street, near to the Tate Modern, the Shard, Borough Market and The Globe, Hilton London Bankside is the latest addition to the vibrant Bankside neighbourhood. 
The hotelâ€™s design has been heavily influenced by the local area, with touches reflecting the Tate Modern and the surrounding urban area found throughout the property. Items having been individually sourced from nearby markets and antique dealers and a curated collection of art and sculpture is on display throughout the hotel. The Distillery is a stylish new bar for Bankside, serving its own Distillery craft beer, a wide selection of gin, and delicious cocktails. OXBO Bankside is a casual restaurant with an open kitchen and quirky design touches that will amuse and entertain. Hilton London Bankside is also a leading new location for meetings, with a variety of flexible meeting rooms and a striking Ballroom. Related articles
